com.thesonofthom.tools

Class BufferMap.AbstractArrayField<T extends BufferMap.AbstractField>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.AbstractField
      • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.AbstractArrayField<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - field type to place in the array
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BufferMap.ComplexArrayField, BufferMap.NumberArrayField, BufferMap.ReservedBitsField
    Enclosing class:
    BufferMap

    protected abstract class BufferMap.AbstractArrayField<T extends BufferMap.AbstractField>
extends BufferMap.AbstractField
    The abstract class for dealing with an array of the same data type. Each class that extends this class MUST call setArray() within their constructors once the array has been initialized

      • getValueAsString

        public java.lang.String getValueAsString()
        for verbose mode, print each element of the array on its own line

        for non-verbose mode, simply print the value of each element on the same line

        Specified by:
